templates.description: Calculates the average of a specific numeric measurement for a single device over a given time period.

params.device: The name of the device to query, possibe formats are R5_<number>, SmartSense_Multi_Sensor_<number>, Zigbee_Thermostat_<number>.
params.property_type: The URI of the measurement type to average, possibe values are: ic:BatteryLevel, ic:CO2Level, ic:Contact, ic:DeviceStatus, ic:RunningTime, ic:thermostatHeatingSetpoint, saref:Humidity, saref:Motion, saref:Occupancy, saref:Power, saref:Temperature.

templates.description: Calculates the average of a specific numeric measurement for all devices on a given floor over a given time period.

params.floor: The name of the floor to query in format VL_floor_<number> (e.g., VL_floor_7).
params.property_type: The URI of the measurement type to average, possibe values are: ic:BatteryLevel, ic:CO2Level, ic:Contact, ic:DeviceStatus, ic:RunningTime, ic:thermostatHeatingSetpoint, saref:Humidity, saref:Motion, saref:Occupancy, saref:Power, saref:Temperature.

templates.description: Counts the number of devices of a specific model/type that are located on a specific floor.

params.floor: The name of the floor to query in format VL_floor_<number> (e.g., VL_floor_7).
params.device_type: The string representing the device model/type, possible values are: Airwits, SmartThings, Sensor Hub.

templates.description: Counts the total number of unique devices located on a specific floor.

params.floor: The name of the floor to query in format VL_floor_<number> (e.g., VL_floor_7).

templates.description: Counts the total number of unique rooms located on a specific floor.

params.floor: The name of the floor to query in format VL_floor_<number> (e.g., VL_floor_7).

templates.description: Counts the number of unique devices that reported a specific status within a given time period.

params.status: The device status to count ('active' or 'inactive').
